author: cnbc.com
title: Cambium Learning Group Reschedules First Quarter 2018 Conference Call to May 14th
text:
DALLAS, May 10, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Cambium Learning ® Group, Inc . (Nasdaq:ABCD) (the “Company”), a leading educational technology solutions company committed to helping all students reach their full potential, announced today that it is rescheduling the issuance of its first quarter 2018 financial results, and the timing of its first quarter 2018 conference call, because of an illness, which is not serious, that temporarily precludes CEO John Campbell from speaking on the call scheduled for tomorrow, May 11, 2018.
The Company will now report financial results for the first quarter ended March 31, 2018, on Monday, May 14, 2018 and will host a conference call at 9 a.m. EST the same day to discuss its financial results. Mr. Campbell is expected to join and speak on this call. Participants are encouraged to listen to the presentation via a live web broadcast at cambiumlearning.com in the Investor Relations section. In addition, a live dial-in is available at 844.707.0670 or 703.639.1224, passcode # 7690846.
A replay will be available by dialing 855.859.2056 or 404.537.3406, passcode # 7690846, until May 15, 2018. The webcast will also be archived on the Company’s Investor Relations page .
About Cambium Learning Group, Inc.
Cambium Learning® Group (Nasdaq:ABCD) is an award-winning educational technology solutions leader dedicated to helping all students reach their potential through individualized and differentiated instruction. Using a research-based, personalized approach, Cambium Learning Group delivers SaaS resources and instructional products that engage students and support teachers in fun, positive, safe and scalable environments. These solutions are provided through Learning A-Z ® (online differentiated instruction for elementary school reading, writing and science), ExploreLearning ® (online interactive math and science simulations and a math fact fluency solution) and Voyager Sopris Learning ® (blended solutions that accelerate struggling learners to achieve in literacy and math and professional development for teachers). We believe that every student has unlimited potential, that teachers matter, and that data, instruction, and practice are the keys to success in the classroom and beyond.
Come learn with us at www.cambiumlearning.com .
